Titles: Watch awkward moment footballer is sent off for crude act
Subtitles: THE bizarre moment took place during a Copa Peru match between Atletico Awajun and Cantorcillo FC. In the 71st minute Awajun were awarded a corner when one player decided to use a break in play to urinate by the side of the pitch.

Subtitles: Four from Man City make the list, while three at under-achieving Man Utd also feature in the top 10.

Subtitles: CRYSTAL PALACE are set to reject Newcastle’s FOURTH bid for the England defender. The offer is not enough to satisfy Palace chairman Steve Parish.

Subtitles: STRIKER hit back at Cucurella in the best manner after he was mocked by the Spaniard's song after the Euros. Haaland scored and then aimed a dig at the defender after the match.

Subtitles: LAURA is believed to have been dating Real Madrid and England star Bellingham in recent months. But the pair did not holiday together this summer as they soaked in the sunshine in different locations.
